Table of Contents

Class ArticleTag

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Models
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Join entity for the many-to-many relationship between Article and Tag. Stores metadata about when and how each tag was applied (user, rule, system). Optimized for fast lookups by article, tag, rule or application source.

[Table("ArticleTags")]
public class ArticleTag

Timestamp when this tag was applied to the article.

public DateTime AppliedAt { get; set; }

Property Value

DateTime

AppliedBy

Source that applied this tag ("user", "rule", "system", "import", etc.). Default: "user".

[Required]
[MaxLength(50)]
public string AppliedBy { get; set; }

int

Confidence

Optional confidence score (0.0–1.0) when the tag was applied by an automated rule or ML. Null for manual/user-applied tags.

public double? Confidence { get; set; }

Internal auto-increment primary key.

[Key]
[DatabaseGenerated(DatabaseGeneratedOption.Identity)]
public int Id { get; set; }

Navigation property to the Rule that applied this tag (if applicable).

[ForeignKey("RuleId")]
public virtual Rule? Rule { get; set; }

RuleId

Optional foreign key to the Rule that automatically applied this tag. Null if applied manually or by system logic.

public int? RuleId { get; set; }
